snippet: Joaquim Saweka, the World Health Organization representative in Uganda, said that everyone known to have had contact with Ebola victims had been isolated.
lead_paragraph: Joaquim Saweka, the World Health Organization representative in Uganda, said that everyone known to have had contact with Ebola victims had been isolated.

headline.main: Uganda: Ebola Outbreak Slows, Health Official Says
headline.print_headline: Uganda: Ebola Outbreak Slows, Health Official Says
